text: I ordered mixed satay in a cup. The satay was really good—juicy and well-marinated. The only thing I didn’t like was that there wasn’t enough satay sauce. Eating satay with little sauce feels incomplete. Please don’t be stingy with the sauce, bro. Your satay sauce is really delicious, it just needs to be more if we want to enjoy it with the satay. Everything else was fine…

Got the Satay cup and Marinated Lamb. Tried their satay delivery before, so the satay in the Satay cup taste pretty much same. What's new is the Marinated Lamb. Black pepper sauce packs a punch. Wish there's some veggie sides to cool down the heat. But still quite worth it with 2 pieces of lamb chop.
Don't let the sign claiming the best satay fool you, it's definitely not the best. Honestly the worst mutton satay I had travelling around south east Asia. Very chewy also.

Bought the chicken and mutton satay, and the grilled prawn. Chicken satay was okay. Mutton satay was good. Grilled prawn was fresh.

Waiting time was about 15 minutes.
Went there twice while on staycay w my mum. 2nd time, my mum wanted more sauce. The staff there was very friendly and helpful. My mum really enjoyed their satay a lot.
